name: webizen-scripts
description: Scripts for building and developing Webizen.
author: MediaProphet

scripts.burnthemall: rm -rf node_modules ../app/node_modules && npm install && npm run rebuild
scripts.build:webext: vite build --outDir dist/webext && cp public/* dist/webext/
scripts.build:android: cd ../app && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file ../platforms/mobile/index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build:ios: cd ../app && npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file ../platforms/mobile/index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/
